inclusion.criterion: Age <18 years and starting anti-TB treatment due to close contact with a TB patient
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Latent Tuberculosis Infectious (LTBI) or Tuberculosis (TB) disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Referral from another center after anti-TB treatment had already begun
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with other chronic diseases requiring hospital follow-up and/or other chronic therapies
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient A is a 30-year-old male who was admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough, profuse nocturnal sweating and loss of appetite. He had traveled to India 1 months ago and has not any positive history of TB vaccination.
